c2effect.name: Sprite Bolt
c2effect.description: Creates a lightning bolt effect down the middle of the sprite.
c2effect.author: Gemini

param.name: Wonkiness
param.description: Controls the jaggedness and height of the bolt's peaks.

param.name: Bolt Color R
param.description: Red component of the bolt color.

param.name: Bolt Color G
param.description: Green component of the bolt color.

param.name: Bolt Color B
param.description: Blue component of the bolt color.

param.name: Bolt Color A
param.description: Alpha component of the bolt color.
